title: We thank India for not attending CHOGM – Lessons not learnt by Sri Lanka
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The present Government will go down in history as giving India the biggest stakes in Sri Lanka’s post-conflict despite being rewarded with consecutive humiliations by India. None of these humiliations have even remotely pushed Sri Lanka’s leaders to realize that India CANNOT be TRUSTED or made Sri Lanka’s leaders…
